title: Episode 69 - Air War In Korea | Rain Of Fire
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode, we review the end of the air war in Korea. We examine the effectiveness of the strategic and political bombing campaign against North Korea in the final year of the war.  We also review technological developments to come out of the air war in Korea and the war's influence on the American air war strategy in the wider Cold War.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we review the end of the air warâ€¦
